00042     template<typename T, Integer _lo, Integer _hi>
00043     class Array : public Aggregate {
00044         enum { static_size = _hi-_lo+1 };
00045     protected:
00047         T _values[static_size];

00206         bool operator< (const Array& rhs) const {
00207             int i=0;
00208             while (i<static_size-1 && _values[i]==rhs._values[i])
00209                 ++i;
00210             return _values[i] < rhs._values[i];

00212         bool operator== (const Array& rhs) const {
00213             int i=0;

00215                 ++i;
00216             return _values[i] == rhs._values[i];

00221         static void checkRange (Integer idx) {
00222             if (idx<_lo)
00223                 throw std::out_of_range("index is below low index");

00225                 throw std::out_of_range("index is over high index");
